content:
Due to extensive training in unarmed combat, the character's
unarmed combat attacks do 1d10-3 + Strength Bonus in
Damage instead of 1d5-3. Because of the character's advanced
training against both armed and unarmed foes, he does not
count as Unarmed, as defined on page 245, when making
attacks against armed opponents. The character's unarmed
attacks still count as having the Primitive quality.
